title: Ping issues
body:
this is making me crazy i tried every possible fix
port forward 
public DNS
Firewall
 whats going on is my ping one game is 40 and the other game is 300-500 if its 40 it will never go up it stay once i finish the game and start another one i get 300  ping I went to custom game and tested  it and it the same one game is good and one game is bad 
here is a game i started http://imgur.com/a/uY4y4 
then exist and started another one http://imgur.com/a/YtMjS 
im going crazy

replies.body:
Wow, that definitely sounds like a really annoying issue since it's intermittent!

It sounds like you've already worked through our connection troubleshooting guide, so we'll need to take a look at your route to the servers to determine what's causing this. I'd like you to use a program called [**WinMTR**](http://winmtr.net/) in order to grab this log. After opening up the app, simply plug in **104.160.131.1** into the host field before you start the trace. After the trace has run for 5 minutes or longer, export the results as text and paste them in a reply to me.

If you run into any issues with this, let me know.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=p0wnFvXY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-17T02:37:08.497+0000)

After the trace has run for 5 minutes or longer, export the results as text and paste them in a reply to me.

Yeah happening to me as well run speedtest in the game and have 15ms try and play and its 300ms sort it out ffs

OMG. This is me. I'm dealing with the same exact issue. 45ms one game or even two in a row and suddenly hit with a game 300ms consistently or upwards to 600ms. Then the very next game 45 ms with no ping fluctuations whatsoever. This (Lag)off/(Lag)on cycle repeats.
It's been a recurring issue for months. And seems to be an league exclusive issue.
I can play another game with a 'ping' counter and that game has normal ping whilst on league game with 300ms+

> [{quoted}](name=ILVLI,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=p0wnFvXY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-16T03:09:52.632+0000)

yes me too just LoL other games are fine
